ch0085_00_hopef/2701_1031_01_10:
Power is important,
but support is, too, right?
ch0085_00_hopef/2701_1031_02_10:
I’m not alone.
I’m going to do my
best with my friends.
ch0085_00_hopef/2701_1031_03_10:
I want to live up to
everybody’s expectations.
ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon and I specialize 
in healing and raising stats!
ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0701_02_10:
I’m not really good at attacking, 
but leave support to me!
ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0701_03_10:
I always come through in the end! 
You can count on me!
ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0702_01_10: If things aren’t going well, just remember me...
ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0702_02_10:
because I’ll always be in your heart!
Ha ha! Just kidding!
ch0085_00_hopef/2702_1031_01_10:
Keep your hopes and
dreams in your heart!
ch0085_00_hopef/2702_1031_02_10:
Let them shine bright like a
rising star!
ch0085_00_hopef/2702_1031_03_10:
You can keep going!
Don’t look back!
ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_01_10:
I know the kind of Trainer that I ultimately 
want to become...
ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_02_10:
and even if my goal seems impossible, 
I’ll never give up hope!
ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_03_10: I’ll reach my dreams and surpass them!
ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_04_10: That will be my life’s work!
ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0702_01_10: If you ever lose sight of your dreams...
ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0702_02_10:
just remember the person you wanted to be.
Envision the future self you aspired to become.
ch0085_00_hopef/2703_1031_01_10:
I hope I can make a lot of
new friends on Pasio, too!
ch0085_00_hopef/2703_1031_02_10:
New friends just make us
betta, y’know?
ch0085_00_hopef/2703_1031_03_10:
Havin’ a rival is always
wicked cool, too!
ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_01_10: Ya gotta watch your buddies’ backs!
ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_02_10:
Whetha it’s with a Pokémon or anotha Trainer,
the powa of bonds is wicked strong.
ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_03_10:
I mean, when yiz pull off a sync move?
Aw, just fugget about it!
ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_04_10: And more importantly, it’s just wicked fun!
ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0702_01_10: Yiz and me? Yeah, we’re already friends!
ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0702_02_10:
Ah, but yiz my rival, too.
Don’t yiz fugget that!
ch0085_00_hopef/2704_1031_01_10:
I can do this!
We can do this!
ch0085_00_hopef/2704_1031_02_10:
I just can’t get enough of
Pokémon battles!
ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_01_10:
I lost a battle the other day.
Man, that was frustrating!
ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_02_10:
So I thought about it, trying to figure out what
went wrong.
ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_03_10:
But I couldn’t figure it out. Was it our
coordination? Maybe my Pokémon and I are
a bad match...
ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_04_10:
The other Trainer probably just did more
research than I did...
ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_05_10:
There are a lot more things I don’t understand,
but if I keep at it, it’ll work itself out!
I’m sure of it!
ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0702_01_10:
I’m sure there are plenty of questions that can’t
be answered no matter how hard you think.
ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0702_02_10:
But not letting that stop you is the sign of
true strength!
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1031_01_10:
I want to be an
Ace Trainer, just like you!
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1031_02_10:
One of these days, I hope
I can be as cool as you!
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1031_03_10:
Well, it’ll probably take a
long time, but...
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1032_01_10:
Well, that’s a lot of
pressure you’re putting
on me. Ha ha!
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1032_02_10:
Oh, your gaze, brimming
with expectations...
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1032_03_10:
Yes! Look at me more!
Tell me how cool I am!
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_01_10:
What should I do when I have more than
one opponent?
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_02_10: There were so many, I got dizzy. So I ran away!
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_03_10:
If you calm down and scope out your opponents,
you’ll find the right target.
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_04_10:
But but but...
How will I know which Pokémon to target?
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_05_10: Think of the type of move you are using.
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_06_10:
Oh, right! I have to pick the Pokémon that my
own Pokémon will have the advantage over!
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_07_10:
Aw, man, I have such a way to go!
I want to be like you faster!
ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_08_10:
Uh, well... Keep at it!
Remember, you can always ask me anything!
ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0101_01_10:
Well, well, well!
Do you really think you can beat me?
ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0501_01_10:
Well, well, well!
Wait... I lost?
ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0601_01_10:
Well, well, well...
You’re pretty good!
ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0601_02_10: Just kidding! I figured you would be this strong!
ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0601_03_10:
But I couldn’t run away, could I? That would be
really uncool!
ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0101_01_10: Oh gosh! I am so good, it’s becoming a burden!
ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0601_01_10: Hold on! You’re way too strong!
ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0601_02_10:
You’re probably stronger than the Elite Four!
You might even win the PML!
ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0601_03_10: Ha ha! Don’t worry—I’m not trying to hustle ya!
